name: To be one - Ep.1- VR
description:
GET READY FOR AN AMAZING ANIMAL EDUCATION VENTURE!

Do you know what it means to be one with frogs?

It is a 360º video for Oculus Go and Quest.

Since 2006 Erik's Reptile Edventures has brought nature into the classrooms of hundreds of schools, libraries, and events through out the New York Tri- State area, and internationally in; Costa Rica, Nicaragua, Madagascar, the Philippines, Malaysia and Indonesia!

Erik Callender has a true passion and love for nature that goes beyond the presentation. Since discovering tadpoles at the age of 6 years during a trip to Bear Mountain, he has continued to follow his dreams to "work with animals" and share his love for nature with others. In 2006 immediately after graduating Stony Brook University, he followed his dreams, and began Erik's Reptile Edventures !

Also, if you want support Erik´s work helping animals and kids in Madagascar click here 

https://naturenow360.info
